text: Ted Wells (1899–1948) was an American actor and stuntman active mainly in westerns.Pitts p.170 ==Selected filmography== * Desert Dust (1927) * Straight Shootin' (1927) * Across the Plains (1928) * Thunder Riders (1928) * Beauty and Bullets (1928) * Grit Wins (1928) * Greased Lightning (1928) * The Crimson Canyon (1928) * The Smiling Terror (1929) * Born to the Saddle (1929) * The Phantom Cowboy (1935) * West of Carson City (1940) * Tucson Raiders (1944) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Michael R. Pitts. Poverty Row Studios, 1929–1940: An Illustrated History of 55 Independent Film Companies, with a Filmography for Each. McFarland & Company, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1899 births Category:1948 deaths Category:American male film actors Category:People from Midland, Texas
title: Ted Wells (actor)
